ratings.comment: Greatest professor at UW-Madison.  He has the best jokes I have ever heard, is an honest(but really quite easy) grader. Plus he understands that you have classes way more important than his, very relaxed with due dates and just a great professor overall.

Pretty good professor. Makes points from different perspectives and is very though provoking. He is a quirky man and makes lame, funny jokes. Really loosely structured class. he sets due dates then changes them. I recommend him for this class. He teaches neat stuff.
If you dont take Ross for 397, you messed up. There is a reason it's so hard to register for his sections. Wait until you get this man.

Pretty sure he's The Dude all grown up, man.  Makes some pretty quirky comments.  Very easy grader, even he admits it.  Flexible due dates, plenty of time for assignments.  Repeats jokes ("The beatings will continue until morale improves" was my favorite)
Has a lot of interesting things to say.  He is very absent minded and will forget things you tell him and will not respond to emails or even read them. Deadlines never set in stone
He was one of the most though provoking teachers that I have had.  I you decide to take the course seriously you can get a lot out of it otherwise why are you even going to college.

P.ROSS IS THE MAN... the colonel as i like to call him. take this class and you will not be dissapointed. he makes quirky jokes and the class was pretty simple Long research paper at the end but he gives PLENTY of time.
A very though provoking teacher who has an odd but good sense of humor. He's easy, but if you really listen to what he has to say, you'll get a lot out of his class.

Paul Ross is very EASY! He talks about anything he finds interesting in class, which may or may not be interesting to you. But his papers are easy and he doesn't really set solid due dates. He'll clarify whatever you want if you ask him after class and he'll basically give you an answer if you ask him the right questions :D

Worthless. This is the worst class you could ever be required to take.  EASY! don't get me wrong but POINTLESS! Sitting there and listen to him talk about Google News for the first two weeks isn't enjoyable, but it doesn't get better! Papers are the only homework but he just rambles, rambles, ramb..
He's a cool guy, makes a lot of jokes.  You write a few papers and take some easy quizes. Easy class
